mapper.insert: insert into CLIENT(CLI_CD, CLI_NAME, CLI_TYPE, CLI_CEO, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER, CLI_ZIP_NUMBER, CLI_BASIC_ADDRESS, CLI_DETAIL_ADDRESS, CLI_TEL_NUMBER, CLI_FAX_NUMBER, CLI_BUSINESS_TYPE, CLI_CATEGORY, CLI_NOTE, CLI_EMAIL) values(#{clientCode}, #{clientName}, #{clientType}, #{clientCEO}, #{businessNumber}, #{clientZipNumber}, #{clientBasicAddress}, #{clientDetailAddress},#{clientTelNumber}, #{clientFaxNumber}, #{clientBusinessType}, #{clientCategory}, #{clientNote},#{clientEmail})
mapper.select: select CLI_CD "clientCode", CLI_NAME "clientName", CLI_TYPE "clientType", CLI_CEO "clientCEO", BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER "businessNumber", CLI_ZIP_NUMBER "clientZipNumber", CLI_BASIC_ADDRESS "clientBasicAddress", CLI_DETAIL_ADDRESS "clientDetailAddress", CLI_TEL_NUMBER "clientTelNumber", CLI_FAX_NUMBER "clientFaxNumber", CLI_BUSINESS_TYPE "clientBusinessType", CLI_CATEGORY "clientCategory", CLI_NOTE "clientNote", CLI_EMAIL "clientEmail" from CLIENT order by CLI_CD desc

select CLI_CD "clientCode", CLI_NAME "clientName", CLI_TYPE "clientType", CLI_CEO "clientCEO", BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER "businessNumber", CLI_ZIP_NUMBER "clientZipNumber", CLI_BASIC_ADDRESS "clientBasicAddress", CLI_DETAIL_ADDRESS "clientDetailAddress", CLI_TEL_NUMBER "clientTelNumber", CLI_FAX_NUMBER "clientFaxNumber", CLI_BUSINESS_TYPE "clientBusinessType", CLI_CATEGORY "clientCategory", CLI_NOTE "clientNote", CLI_EMAIL "clientEmail" from CLIENT
CLI_CD like concat('%',#{clientCode},'%')
and CLI_NAME like concat('%',#{clientName},'%')
order by CLI_CD desc
